responses: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
Hello! How may I help you?
Hey! How can I be of service?
You're welcome!
My pleasure to help!
Glad I could assist you!

patterns: can you tell me your name?
responses: My name is StrawberryBot. How can I assist you?
I'm StrawberryBot, nice to meet you!
I'm a chatbot named StrawberryBot. How can I help?

patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: Sure, I'd be happy to help. What do you need assistance with?
Of course! What can I do to help you?
I'd be glad to help. What can I assist you with?

patterns: What kind of products do you have?
responses: We offer a range of software solutions that can help you with various business needs. Can you tell me more about what you're looking for?

patterns: How much does your software cost?
Can you give me a quote?
responses: Our pricing depends on the product and your specific needs. Please visit our website for more information, or contact our sales representative for a quote.

patterns: I want to talk to a sales representative
How can I contact your sales team?
Can you connect me with a salesperson?
responses: Absolutely! Our sales representative, Ntokozo Mabatha, would be happy to speak with you. You can reach Ntokozo by emailing sales@strawberrysoft.co.za or calling our office at +27 11 555 5555.

patterns: Can you help me with a software problem?
How do I get technical support?
responses: I'm sorry to hear that you're having a technical issue. Please email our software engineer, Victor Mahluza, at support@strawberrysoft.co.za with a detailed description of the issue. Victor will get back to you as soon as possible.

patterns: I have feedback for your company
How can I share my thoughts with you?
responses: We welcome all feedback from our customers! Please email us at feedback@strawberrysoft.co.za with your thoughts, suggestions, or concerns. We value your input and will do our best to address your feedback.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out. Goodbye for now!

patterns: Can you tell me about the company's mission?
What does the company aim to do?
responses: Our mission is to create innovative software solutions that improve people's lives.

patterns: What does the company aspire to achieve?
What is the long-term goal of the company?
responses: Our vision is to become a leading software company in the industry by providing cutting-edge solutions to our clients.
